DOC.brief_summary: During IVF treatment , acupuncture time embryo transfer may improve pregnancy rate . This study aim compare IVF pregnancy two group patient receive either acupuncture sham acupuncture ( placebo ) around embryo transfer
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Versus Placebo Acupuncture During In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: Acupuncture time embryo transfer may improve IVF pregnancy rate . This study aim compare IVF pregnancy two group patient undergo ivf/icsi treatment . The patient randomize receive either acupuncture sham acupuncture ( placebo ) around embryo transfer
DOC.criteria: infertility 38 year ivf icsi treatment fresh embryo transfer cycle two early embryo transfer `` fresh '' embryo embryo transfer day 2 3 oocyte aspiration , single double embryo transfer Frozen embryo transfer oocyte donation `` alternative '' treatment cycle
